pages.title: Evaporation Tower
pages.text: A method to remove heavy materials from water. When constructed, the tower will slowly and passively generate various resources. The resource lootable depends on the water of a location (biome). $(li)Oceans & Deserts $(li)Rivers and Swamps $(li)Elsewhere
Construction notes: $(li)The inside is filled with water.$() $(li)The walls are made from any #forge:functional_sheetmetals$(). In the future, height may affect speed.
